name: viraltweetfilter
description: Browser extension to filter "viral" Tweets from your timeline.
author: Ralph Drake <rama.o.ralph@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: yarn run mozManifest && web-ext lint && eslint . --max-warnings 0
scripts.crBuild: yarn run crManifest && web-ext build && yarn run crBackground
scripts.mozPublish: yarn run mozManifest && PKG_VERSION=$npm_package_version node scripts/mozPublish.js
scripts.crStart: yarn run crManifest && yarn start -t chromium
